title: Snapshots of typography in Paris
content:
I just returned from a short trip to Paris.  
I made a few photos of typography over there.

You can find them here: [http://www.createdbydesign.nl/paris2008](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419081857/http:/www.createdbydesign.nl/paris2008 "http://www.createdbydesign.nl/paris2008")
author: bobbybobo

comments.content: The French language looks fantastic in Futura, thanks for the upload Bobby!
Lots of cool pictures and examples of typography! Was a bit suprised that one of the best (at least designs, if not type) was in a H&M window \>\_\< :P

Thanks! That was quite fun and inspiring to me. I even bookmarked the website.

Karen
